updates.title: How we shaped the visual identity for Config 2025
updates.description: From giant inflatable glyphs to welcoming soundscapes, Figma’s Brand Studio designed an immersive conference that celebrated the spirit of makership at every turn.

updates.title: Charmaine Lee’s 10 rules for building developer tools that feel like magic
updates.description: As a product manager working on Snapchat’s Lens Studio for AR developers, Charmaine knows what it takes to delight creators.

updates.title: AI data center boom could be bad news for other infrastructure projects
updates.description: Improvements to roads, bridges, and other infrastructure could take a hit as data center construction accelerates.

updates.title: Disney signs deal with OpenAI to allow Sora to generate AI videos featuring its characters
updates.description: Disney says that alongside the agreement, it will "become a major customer of OpenAI," as it will use its APIs to build new products, tools, and experiences, including for Disney+.
